name: Isha
appearance: Broad-armed docker with meteoric-iron scale weights tattooed down one forearm, hair in a red scarf, quick smile lined by sleepless nights.
character: Fiercely protective of labor, faster to feed than to forgive, thrives in the heat of an assembly.
talents: turns a chant into a movement
reads a foreman’s lie at a glance
dreams: Win a public labor seat on the Trium
Standardize safe muster stairs in every chainhouse
secrets: Funded lantern blackouts to dramatize unsafe quays during negotiations
Shelters a deserter Warden under a false docker’s name
